Reading Eric Mextaxas book “Letter to the American Church”, in chapter three he starts out with a verse from a he book of Revelation chapter 2:4-5: “But I have this against you, that you have abandoned the the love you had at first. Remember therefore from where you have fallen l; repent, and do the works you did at first. If not, I will come to you and remove your lamp stand from your place.”

Christ is speaking to His church and we need to look at ourselves and see how far we have fallen from Christ in worshipping him first and not follow the world and accept their ways into God’s church. Remember what happened to the German churches in the 1930’s and what happened to the Israelites when they failed to worship God and started accepting the secular world.
